segments.text: Thereâ€™s a certain innocence to the way the kids are trying to steal cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I can't shake the feeling that it's not a good idea.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman continues her task, blissfully unaware, and that frustrates me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Does she really not see the danger in the boy's antics?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water splashing onto the floor is a sight to behold, yet it feels so wrong somehow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It contrasts sharply with the bright garden outside, which seems so safe and inviting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the mood of this kitchen could shift so quickly, from peaceful to chaotic.
segments.speaker: PAR
